verses.name: 2 Kings 24:3
verses.text: Surely at the commandment of the Lord came this upon Judah, to remove them out of his sight, for the sins of Manasseh, according to all that he did;

verses.name: 2 Kings 24:4
verses.text: And also for the innocent blood that he shed: for he filled Jerusalem with innocent blood; which the Lord would not pardon.

verses.name: 2 Kings 24:5
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 2 Kings 24:6
verses.text: So Jehoiakim slept with his fathers: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead.
